text: Ruby Versfeld (born 17 September 1996) is a South African water polo player. She competed for the South Africa women's national water polo team in the 2015 World Aquatics Championships. She played for California State University, Bakersfield's women's water polo team and the University of St Andrews' women's water polo team. On 11 September 2020, she was inaugurated into The Jolly Boys as an Honorary Member.Press release: The Jolly Boys 11 Sep 2020. Ruby Versfeld becomes Honorary Member of The Jolly Boys. == References == Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:South African water polo players
title: Ruby Versfeld
